headline: UDR Provides Fourth Quarter 2024 Business Update
summary: DENVER, January 06, 2025--UDR, Inc. (the "Company") (NYSE: UDR), a leading multifamily real estate investment trust, today announced its preliminary financial results, operating results, and investment activity for the fourth quarter 2024. Full-year 2024 results and 2025 guidance will be provided on February 5, 2025, when UDR reports its earnings results for the quarter and year ended December 31, 2024.
